name: Huge World
description: A puzzle with beautiful photos from different parts of the world. Each level consists of 49 elements that will have to be rotated to match all the elements. The game contains 20 levels of medium difficulty. The game has a choice of levels and you can start immediately guessing any puzzle of your choice. If you do not have time to finish the game, you can save it and continue playing at any time, each level will be saved separately. The pictures become a little more complicated with each level. Put all the elements correctly and the game will automatically go to the next level. If you are at a loss, then click the icon with a question mark and the game will tell you where to put the desired element. In the game, you can flip through the levels without going through them if they caused difficulty in passing, just press the arrow to the right. The game will delight you with nice graphics and calm music.
